channel.title: SoftLayer_Scale_Member_Virtual_Guest on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Scale_Member_Virtual_Guest on SoftLayer API

item.title: deleteObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Scale_Member_Virtual_Guest::deleteObject Delete this group member. Overview Delete this group member. Note, this can only be done on an active group when it wont cause the group to go below its minimumMemberCount. This is not the recommended way to delete members. Instead, users should invoke scale(-1) on SoftLayer_Scale_Group so it can choose the best guest member to remove. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Scale_Member_Virtual_GuestInitParameters Optional Headers Return Values boolean
